alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 8:11PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cameron and southwestern Calcasieu Parishes through 845 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Orange, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Cameron and southwestern Calcasieu Parishes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
